verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying <S%H559><s%> to them,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> These <S%H2063><s%> are the beasts <S%H2416><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> that are on <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Whatever <S%H3605><s%> parts <S%H6536><s%> the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> and is cloven footed, <S%H8156><s%> <S%H8157><s%> <S%H6541><s%> and chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> among the beasts, <S%H929><s%> that shall you eat. <S%H398><s%>

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> shall you not eat <S%H398><s%> of them that chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> or of them that divide <S%H6536><s%> the hoof: <S%H6541><s%> as the camel, <S%H1581><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> but divides <S%H6536><s%> not the hoof; <S%H6541><s%> he is unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.
And the coney, <S%H8227><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> but divides <S%H6536><s%> not the hoof; <S%H6541><s%> he is unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.
And the hare, <S%H768><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> but divides <S%H6536><s%> not the hoof; <S%H6541><s%> he is unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.

And the swine, <S%H2386><s%> though he divide <S%H6536><s%> the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> and be cloven footed, <S%H8156><s%> <S%H8157><s%> <S%H6541><s%> yet he chews <S%H1641><s%> not the cud; <S%H1625><s%> he is unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.
Of their flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall you not eat, <S%H398><s%> and their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall you not touch; <S%H5060><s%> they are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.

These <S%H2088><s%> shall you eat <S%H398><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that are in the waters: <S%H4325><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> has fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> in the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and in the rivers, <S%H5158><s%> them shall you eat. <S%H398><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> that have not fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> in the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and in the rivers, <S%H5158><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that move <S%H8318><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and of any <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing <S%H5315><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> they shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> to you:
They shall be even an abomination <S%H8263><s%> to you; you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of their flesh, <S%H1320><s%> but you shall have their carcasses <S%H5038><s%> in abomination. <S%H8262><s%>
Whatever <S%H3605><s%> has no <S%H369><s%> fins <S%H5579><s%> nor scales <S%H7193><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> that shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> to you.

And these <S%H428><s%> are they which you shall have in abomination <S%H8262><s%> among <S%H4480><s%> the fowls; <S%H5775><s%> they shall not be eaten, <S%H398><s%> they are an abomination: <S%H8263><s%> the eagle, <S%H5404><s%> and the ossifrage, <S%H6538><s%> and the ospray, <S%H5822><s%>
And the vulture, <S%H1676><s%> and the kite <S%H344><s%> after his kind; <S%H4327><s%>
Every <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605><s%> raven <S%H6158><s%> after his kind; <S%H4327><s%>
And the owl, <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3284><s%> and the night <S%H8464><s%> hawk, <S%H8464><s%> and the cuckoo, <S%H7828><s%> and the hawk <S%H5322><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%>
And the little <S%H3563><s%> owl, <S%H3563><s%> and the cormorant, <S%H7994><s%> and the great <S%H3244><s%> owl, <S%H3244><s%>
And the swan, <S%H8580><s%> and the pelican, <S%H6893><s%> and the gier <S%H7360><s%> eagle, <S%H7360><s%>
And the stork, <S%H2624><s%> the heron <S%H601><s%> after her kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the lapwing, <S%H1744><s%> and the bat. <S%H5847><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> fowls <S%H5775><s%> that creep, <S%H8318><s%> going <S%H1980><s%> on all four, <S%H702><s%> shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> to you.

Yet <S%H389><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> may you eat <S%H398><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> flying <S%H5775><s%> creeping <S%H8318><s%> thing that goes <S%H1980><s%> on all four, <S%H702><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have legs <S%H3767><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> their feet, <S%H7272><s%> to leap <S%H5425><s%> with <S%H2004><s%> on the earth; <S%H776><s%>

Even these <S%H428><s%> of them you may eat; <S%H398><s%> the locust <S%H697><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the bald <S%H5556><s%> locust <S%H5556><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the beetle <S%H2728><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the grasshopper <S%H2284><s%> after his kind. <S%H4327><s%>
But all <S%H3605><s%> other flying <S%H5775><s%> creeping <S%H8318><s%> things, which <S%H834><s%> have four <S%H702><s%> feet, <S%H7272><s%> shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> to you.

And for these <S%H428><s%> you shall be unclean: <S%H2930><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of them shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

And whoever <S%H3605><s%> bears <S%H5375><s%> ought of the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of them shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

The carcasses of every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> which <S%H834><s%> divides <S%H6536><s%> the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> and is not cloven footed, <S%H8156><s%> <S%H8157><s%> <S%H6541><s%> nor <S%H369><s%> chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you: every <S%H3605><s%> one that touches <S%H5060><s%> them shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

And whatever <S%H3605><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> on his paws, <S%H3709><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> manner of beasts <S%H2416><s%> that go <S%H1980><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> all four, <S%H702><s%> those <S%H1992><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you: whoever <S%H3605><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

And he that bears <S%H5375><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of them shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even: <S%H6153><s%> they are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.

These <S%H2088><s%> also shall be unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you among the creeping <S%H8318><s%> things that creep <S%H8317><s%> on the earth; <S%H776><s%> the weasel, <S%H2467><s%> and the mouse, <S%H5909><s%> and the tortoise <S%H6632><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%>
And the ferret, <S%H604><s%> and the chameleon, <S%H3581><s%> and the lizard, <S%H3911><s%> and the snail, <S%H2546><s%> and the mole. <S%H8580><s%>

These <S%H2088><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you among all <S%H3605><s%> that creep: <S%H8318><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> does touch <S%H5060><s%> them, when they be dead, <S%H4194><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

And on whatever <S%H3605><s%> any of them, when they are dead, <S%H4194><s%> does fall, <S%H5307><s%> it shall be unclean; <S%H2930><s%> whether it be any <S%H3605><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> of wood, <S%H6086><s%> or <S%H176><s%> raiment, <S%H899><s%> or <S%H176><s%> skin, <S%H5785><s%> or <S%H176><s%> sack, <S%H8242><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> it be, wherein <S%H834><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%> is done, <S%H6213><s%> it must be put <S%H935><s%> into water, <S%H4325><s%> and it shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even; <S%H6153><s%> so it shall be cleansed. <S%H2891><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel, <S%H3627><s%> into where <S%H834><s%> any of them falls, <S%H5307><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> is in it shall be unclean; <S%H2930><s%> and you shall break <S%H7665><s%> it.

Of all <S%H3605><s%> meat <S%H400><s%> which <S%H834><s%> may be eaten, <S%H398><s%> that on <S%H5921><s%> which <S%H834><s%> such water <S%H4325><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> shall be unclean: <S%H2930><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> drink <S%H4945><s%> that may be drunk <S%H8354><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> such vessel <S%H3627><s%> shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> thing whereupon <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> any part of their carcass <S%H5038><s%> falls <S%H5307><s%> shall be unclean; <S%H2930><s%> whether it be oven, <S%H8574><s%> or ranges <S%H3600><s%> for pots, they shall be broken <S%H5422><s%> down: <S%H5422><s%> for they are unclean <S%H2931><s%>and shall be unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> a fountain <S%H4599><s%> or pit, <S%H953><s%> wherein there is plenty <S%H4723><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> shall be clean: <S%H2889><s%> but that which touches <S%H5060><s%> their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> any part of their carcass <S%H5038><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> on any <S%H3605><s%> sowing <S%H2221><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is to be sown, <S%H2232><s%> it shall be clean. <S%H2889><s%>

But if <S%H3588><s%> any water <S%H4325><s%> be put <S%H5414><s%> on the seed, <S%H2233><s%> and any part of their carcass <S%H5038><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> it shall be unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.

And if <S%H3588><s%> any beast, <S%H929><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> you may eat, <S%H402><s%> die; <S%H4191><s%> he that touches <S%H5060><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> thereof shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

And he that eats <S%H398><s%> of the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of it shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even: <S%H6153><s%> he also that bears <S%H5375><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of it shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>
And every <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H8318><s%> thing that creeps <S%H8317><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be an abomination; <S%H8263><s%> it shall not be eaten. <S%H398><s%>

Whatever <S%H3605><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> on the belly, <S%H1512><s%> and whatever <S%H3605><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> on all four, <S%H702><s%> or <S%H5704><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> has more <S%H7235><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H8318><s%> things that creep <S%H8317><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> them you shall not eat; <S%H398><s%> for they are an abomination. <S%H8263><s%>

You shall not make yourselves <S%H5315><s%> abominable <S%H8262><s%> with any <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H8318><s%> thing that creeps, <S%H8317><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you make yourselves <S%H5315><s%> unclean <S%H2930><s%> with them, that you should be defiled <S%H2933><s%> thereby.

For I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> you shall therefore sanctify <S%H6942><s%> yourselves, <S%H5315><s%> and you shall be holy; <S%H6918><s%> for I am holy: <S%H6918><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you defile <S%H2930><s%> yourselves <S%H5315><s%> with any <S%H3605><s%> manner of creeping <S%H8318><s%> thing that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

For I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that brings <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to be your God: <S%H430><s%> you shall therefore be holy, <S%H6918><s%> for I am holy. <S%H6918><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the beasts, <S%H929><s%> and of the fowl, <S%H5775><s%> and of every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that moves <S%H7430><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and of every <S%H3605><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that creeps <S%H8317><s%> on the earth: <S%H776><s%>

To make a difference <S%H914><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean, <S%H2889><s%> and between <S%H996><s%> the beast <S%H2416><s%> that may be eaten <S%H398><s%> and the beast <S%H2416><s%> that may not be eaten. <S%H398><s%>
